system.description: The character's faith grants them the ability to channel divine fury into their attacks.
system.benefit: When making an attack can spend a fate point to add 1d5 Damage. Can burn a fate point to automatically trigger Righteous Fury on one attack, and automatically deal max damage + 1d10, this can lead to further righteous furies.

specialAbilities.name: Divine Fury
specialAbilities.description: Spend Fate Point: add 1d5 damage to attack. Burn Fate Point: auto-trigger Righteous Fury with max damage + 1d10 (can chain).
